text:
Dear NAEB Member?
The ROA - Victor people have approved an
annual fee of $12.00 for the non-commercial,
educationally* and munioipally owned and
operated radio stations. The NASB committee
now suggests that all members who have not
done so, forward to ROA - Victor a payment
of $12.00 for the first 12 months. If you have
already paid any amount to RCA - Victor this
amount will be credited to you and if you
have paid more than the one year fee, a refund
will be sent you* The suggestion is to fill
out a form which RCA originally sent you,
changing only that section regarding fees,
making it read $12.00 per year.
Someone has raised the question regarding
the announcement provision of the original
oontraot. It is suggested that no exceptions
be made in this case, although I can assure
you that this is not ihtended to apply to the
non-commercial, educational, and munioipal
stations and that RCA will take no action
regarding this announcement and it is not
intended to apply to the educatiohal stations.
Cordially yours,
P.S. Again, this is striokly confidential
to the non-commercial, educational radio
stations. fas
